name: Zombie War Shoot
description:
Zombie War Shoot is an epic, terrifying and horrifying war game in zombie city where you have to kill & shoot these crazy, monster and vicious evil zombies. Now you have to keep hunting all the zombies to save your city. Use sniper or various deadly weapons to kill down all the zombies in this FPS game.

Features:
- Amazing 3d environment city
- Many trilling missions to complete by using sniper shooting
- Realistic bullet effect in shooting warfare
- High quality graphics & cool animation
- Very Smooth controls for sniper shooting
